title: Villainess With a Cat Changing System - Novel Updates
tags: Acting   Animal Characteristics   Beautiful Female Lead   Business Management   Celebrities   Character Growth   Clingy Lover   Confident Protagonist   Couple Growth   Dense Protagonist   Different Social Status   Doting Older Siblings   Enemies Become Lovers   Female Protagonist   Game Ranking System   Hard-Working Protagonist   Hot-blooded Protagonist   Jealousy   Kind Love Interests   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Love Rivals   Modern Day   Money Grubber   Past Trauma   Persistent Love Interests   Pets   Phobias   Popular Love Interests   Selfish Protagonist   Straight Uke   Transmigration   Tsundere   Villainess Noble Girls   Younger Sisters
author: 笑蓝
description:
Huo Yu, a second rich generation with Doraphobia, suddenly became a small kitty cat, and the bound system told her that she was cursed because of her persecution to the Heroine, and that the happiness value of the Heroine is needed to be exchanged for the length of time to became human.

The Heroine of this world is Lin Shuwei, her tortured rival.

Huo Yu, who had not thought of a countermeasure, was picked up by Lin Shuwei and became her cat.

***

Lin Shuwei always thought that President Xiao Huo hated herself, until one day she found that Xiao Huo not only personally saved her from bullying, but also hired an army to fight against the haters, and become the number one of her fans.

Xiao Huo who will always open her alt account to tear the haters, and will send many praises to her every day to give her warmth, is her own loyal fan!

Lin Shuwei observed her silently and found that Xiao Huo became cuter and cuter and more and more like her cat.

***

Huo Yu and Lin Shuwei, the new film star, have been voted the best CP of the year after a variety show.

Huo Yu was cold-faced when she was asked about her relationship with Lin Shuwei: Working relationship, not familiar!

However, that night Huo Yu sent a Weibo:

Love relationship, thank you for your concern @LinShuwei

Netizens who loved to eat gua zi are forced to eat gua zi, and CP fans are very happy.

At this time, Huo Yu narrowed her eyes and tried to improve Lin Shuwei’s happiness in her arms.>
